sections.css:
$listing-items-padding: $line-height-base/6

// Ordered/Unordered list
ul:not([class]),
ol:not([class])
  margin: 0 0 $paragraphs-margin
  li:not([class])
    padding: $listing-items-padding 0
    ul,
    ol
      margin: $listing-items-padding 0 0

// Unordered list
ul:not([class])
  padding-left: 0
  li:not([class])
    position: relative
    padding-left: 30px
    &:before
      content: "\2022"
      color: $brand-primary
      font-size: 1.5em
      position: absolute
      top: $listing-items-padding/3
      left: 0
    ul li:before
        content: "\25E6"
ul li
  list-style: none

//Ordered list
ol:not([class])
  -webkit-padding-start: 30px

// Description list
dl
  margin: 0 0 $paragraphs-margin
  dt,
  dd
    padding: $line-height-base/6 0
  dt
    float: left
    clear: left
    width: 30%
  dd
    width: 70%
    margin-left: 30%

Help text

sections.css:
$form-item-width: 300px
$form-item-height: 40px
$form-item-margin: 30px
$form-item-font-size: $font-size-base
$form-item-bg: $gray-lighter

// Block
// --------------------------------------------------
.form
  margin: 0


// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.form__item
  margin: 0 0 $form-item-margin
  position: relative
  width: $form-item-width
  overflow: visible
  box-sizing: border-box
  max-width: 100%
  // Make form item full collumn width if is is composed in grid layout:
  *[class^="col-"] > &,
  *[class^="col-"] > .box > &
    width: auto
// Table layout integration
td, th
  &.form__item
    margin: 0
    padding: 0
    vertical-align: middle


.form__label
  display: block
  margin: 0
  font-size: $font-size-small
  text-transform: none
  font-weight: $font-weight-bold


.form__actions
  margin-top: $form-item-margin * 3
  button,
  input[type="button"],
  input[type="submit"]
    margin: 0


.form__input
  width: 100%
  margin: 0
  border: 2px solid transparent
  border-radius: 0
  height: $form-item-height
  line-height: $form-item-height - ($form-item-height/3)
  padding: $form-item-height/6 10px
  box-sizing: border-box
  font-size: $form-item-font-size
  transition: all 200ms ease-in
  background-color: $form-item-bg
  +placeholder($gray-light)
  &[type=file]
    line-height: $form-item-height * 0.45
textarea.form__input
  height: auto
select.form__input
  -webkit-appearance: none
  padding-right: 30px
  cursor: pointer
  // Custom caret:
  &:not([multiple])
    background:
      image: linear-gradient(45deg, transparent 50%, $text-color 50%), linear-gradient(135deg, $text-color 50%, transparent 50%)
      position: calc(100% - 15px) $form-item-height/2-2px, calc(100% - 10px) $form-item-height/2-2px
      size: 5px 5px, 5px 5px
      repeat: no-repeat
  &[multiple]
    height: auto


.form__checkbox,
.form__radio
  display: block


.form__help
  position: absolute
  top: 100%
  display: block
  margin: 0
  font-size: $font-size-xsmall
  line-height: $font-size-xsmall * 1.5
  color: lighten($text-color, 10%)


.form__addon
  position: absolute
  top: $line-height-base
  right: $form-item-height / 3
  font-size: $form-item-font-size * 0.7
  line-height: $form-item-height


// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.form__item--inline
  width: 100%
  .form__checkbox,
  .form__radio
    display: inline-block
    margin-right: 20px

.form__item--fancy
  .form__checkbox
    input
      position: relative
      width: 36px
      height: 14px
      display: inline-block
      background-color: $gray-light
      margin: 0 5px 0 0
      padding: 0
      border-radius: 7px
      -webkit-appearance: none
      border: none
      outline: 0
      vertical-align: middle
      transform: translateY(-1px)
      cursor: pointer
      &::after
        content: ''
        display: block
        width: 20px
        height: 20px
        position: absolute
        left: 0
        top: -3px
        background-color: $gray-lighter
        border: 1px solid darken($gray-lighter, 5%)
        border-radius: 10px
        box-sizing: border-box
      &:checked
        background-color: $green
        &::after
          left: auto
          right: 0


// States
// --------------------------------------------------
.form__input:focus
  border: 2px solid $brand-primary
  box-shadow: none
  outline-width: 0


*[disabled]
  opacity: 0.5
  cursor: not-allowed
input[disabled],
textarea[disabled],
select[disabled],
*[disabled] input,
*[disabled] textarea,
*[disabled] select,
*[disabled] .form__checkbox,
*[disabled] .form__radio
  pointer-events: none

.form__item.is-success
  .form__label,
  .form__addon,
  .form__help,
  .form__checkbox,
  .form__radio
    color: darken($green, 5%)
  .form__input:not(:focus)
    border-color: lighten($green, 10%)


.form__item.has-error
  .form__label,
  .form__addon,
  .form__help,
  .form__checkbox,
  .form__radio
    color: darken($red, 15%)
  .form__input:not(:focus)
    border-color: lighten($red, 15%)
    background-color: lighten($red, 53%)

A multiple steps timeline, where current step is indicated by special modifier class.

Start
Page 1
Page 2
Page 3
Page 4

sections.css:
// Block
// --------------------------------------------------
.timeline
  margin: 21px auto 16px
  display: table
  width: 100%
  max-width: 740px
  table-layout: fixed
  line-height: 21px

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.timeline__label
  margin: 20px 0 0 50%
  width: 100%
  text-align: center
  white-space: nowrap
  font-weight: $font-weight-bold

.timeline__item
  display: table-cell
  position: relative
  overflow: visible
  // Dots
  &::before
    content: ''
    position: absolute
    right: -7px
    display: block
    width: 15px
    height: 15px
    background-color: $brand-primary-light
    border: 4px solid $brand-primary-light
    border-radius: 50%
    box-sizing: border-box
    z-index: 2

  // First element
  &:first-of-type
    width: 0
    .timeline__label
      width: 40px
      margin-left: -20px

  // All other elements
  & + .timeline__item
    &::after
      content: ''
      position: absolute
      display: block
      height: 4px
      width: calc(100% - 10px)
      right: 5px
      top: 5px
      z-index: 1
      background-color: $brand-primary-light

// States
// --------------------------------------------------
.timeline__item.is-active
  .timeline__label
    font-weight: $font-weight-bold
  & ~ .timeline__item
    &::before
      border-color: $gray-lighter
      background-color: transparent
    &::after
      background-color: $gray-lighter

sections.description: Accordion switched by pure CSS basing on radio inputs, inspired by http://youmightnotneedjs.com/#tabs. Works with up to 7 elements.
sections.markup:
Content for the first accordion

Content for the second accordion

Content for the third accordion
sections.css:
// Block
// --------------------------------------------------
// .accordion

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.accordion__input
  // Visually hide radio buttons
  position: absolute
  opacity: 0

.accordion__label
  position: relative
  display: block
  cursor: pointer
  margin: 0 0 1px
  background: $gray-light
  color: white
  padding: 3px 40px 3px 10px
  overflow: hidden
  &::after
    content: '+'
    position: absolute
    display: block
    top: 0
    right: 0
    height: 100%
    width: 30px
    padding: 3px 0
    text-align: center
  &:checked
    content: '-'

.accordion__content
  height: 0
  opacity: 0
  transition: 500ms opacity ease-in-out

// States
// --------------------------------------------------
// Open content when clicking label (jQuery mimic)
$foo : ''
@for $i from 1 through 7
  $foo : $foo + '#accordion-toggle-' + $i + ':checked ~ #accordion-content-' + $i + ','
#{$foo}
  height: auto
  opacity: 1
  padding: 20px 10px 0

// Change symbol on label.
.accordion__input:checked + .accordion__label
  &::after
    content: '-'

modifiers.description: Decreased opacity and cmouse ursor change

sections.markup: Button
sections.css:
// Block
// --------------------------------------------------
.btn
  background: transparent
  padding: 11px 25px
  font-family: $font-family-base
  font-weight: $font-weight-bold
  font-size: $font-size-base
  letter-spacing: 0.05em
  border: 2px solid
  border-radius: 30px
  white-space: nowrap
  cursor: pointer
  display: inline-block
  width: auto
  height: auto
  box-sizing: border-box
  +btn-color($text-color)
  &:hover, &:focus
    transition: color 250ms, border-color 250ms, background 250ms
    +btn-color(#fff, $text-color, $text-color)

.btn + .btn
  margin-left: 15px

button,
input[type="button"],
input[type="submit"]
  @extend .btn
  margin-top: 30px


// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.btn--block
  width: 100%
  display: block
  max-width: none
  text-align: center
  & + &
    margin: 25px 0 0

.btn--xs
  padding: 3px 10px 4px

.btn--sm
  padding: 7px 20px 9px

.btn--lg
  padding: 15px 35px
  border-radius: 30px

.btn--light
  +btn-color(#fff, #fff)
  &:hover, &:focus
    +btn-color($text-color, #fff, #fff)
    font-weight: $font-weight-bold

.btn--primary
  +btn-color(#fff, $brand-primary, $brand-primary)
  &:hover, &:focus
    +btn-color($brand-primary)
    font-weight: $font-weight-bold

.btn--link
  border: none
  padding-left: 0
  padding-right: 0
  +btn-color($brand-primary, $brand-primary)
  &:hover, &:focus
    +btn-color($brand-primary)
    text-decoration: underline

.btn--disabled
  opacity: 0.15
  cursor: not-allowed
sections.renderMarkup: Button

sections.description: A circular diagram based on pure CSS technique. animation-delay value serves as a percentage input. Delete ::after pseudoclass styling to get the full pie chart. Inspired by http://codepen.io/MikitaLisavets/pen/PqEwvV
sections.markup: 42%
sections.css:
$donut-chart-size: 100px
$donut-chart-bar-width: 33px

// Block
// --------------------------------------------------
.donut-chart
  width: $donut-chart-size
  height: $donut-chart-size
  margin: 0 auto
  background: $gray-lightest linear-gradient(to right, $gray-lightest 50%, $gray-light 50%)
  color: $gray-light
  border-radius: 50%
  position: relative
  &::before
    content: ''
    position: absolute
    display: block
    background-color: inherit
    height: 100%
    width: 50%
    bottom: 0
    right: 0
    border-radius: 0 100% 100% 0 / 50%
    transform: rotate(0)
    transform-origin: 0 50%
    animation: 50s donut-chart-spin infinite linear, 100s donut-chart-background infinite step-end
    animation-play-state: paused
    animation-delay: inherit
  // Inner circle mask. Delete it to get pie chart.
  &::after
    content: ''
    position: absolute
    width: $donut-chart-size - $donut-chart-bar-width
    height: $donut-chart-size - $donut-chart-bar-width
    top: 0
    right: 0
    bottom: 0
    left: 0
    margin: auto
    background: #fff
    border-radius: 50%


@keyframes donut-chart-spin
  to
    transform: rotate(180deg)
@keyframes donut-chart-background
  50%
    background-color: currentColor


// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.donut-chart__label
  position: absolute
  top: 50%
  left: 0
  right: 0
  width: 50px
  margin: 0 auto
  transform: translateY(-50%)
  font-weight: $font-weight-bold
  text-align: center
  z-index: 1
  color: $gray-base
sections.renderMarkup: 42%

$tooltip-bg-color: #2c3e50
$tooltip-width: 200px
$tooltip-triangle-size: 6px

// Block
// --------------------------------------------------
.tooltip
  display: inline-block
  position: relative

  &:before, &:after
    opacity: 0
    z-index: 98
    +breakpoint(phone, phone)
      display: none

  &:before
    // tooltip body
    content: attr(data-tooltip)
    position: absolute
    width: $tooltip-width
    padding: 10px 15px
    line-height: 18px
    text-align: left
    font-size: 13px
    font-weight: normal
    white-space: normal
    box-shadow: 1px 1px 3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3)
    border-radius: 3px
    background-color: $tooltip-bg-color

    @if lightness($tooltip-bg-color) < 50%
      // dynamically determine light or dark color based on $tooltip-bg-color
      color: #fff
    @else
      color: $gray-base

  &:after
    content: ''

  &:hover
    &:before, &:after
      opacity: 1



// Tooltip styling mixin
=tooltip($direction: tl)
  // apply positioning to top and bottom values
  @if $direction == "tl" or $direction == "tr"
    &:before
      top: -($tooltip-triangle-size + 3px)
      bottom: auto

      // override with auto in case this tooltip is overriding a previous instance in another direction
      transform: translateY(-100%)

    &:after
      +triangle(down, $tooltip-triangle-size, $tooltip-bg-color)

      top: -($tooltip-triangle-size + 3px)
      bottom: auto
  @else if $direction == "br" or $direction == "bl"
    &:before
      bottom: -($tooltip-triangle-size + 3px)
      top: auto

      // extra 3px for spacing
      transform: translateY(100%)

    &:after
      +triangle(up, $tooltip-triangle-size, $tooltip-bg-color)

      bottom: -($tooltip-triangle-size + 3px)
      top: auto

  // apply positioning to left and right values
  @if $direction == "tr" or $direction == "br"
    &:before, &:after
      left: 50%
      right: auto
      margin-left: -$tooltip-triangle-size

    &:before
      margin-left: -$tooltip-triangle-size * 3
  @else if $direction == "tl" or $direction == "bl"
    &:before, &:after
      right: 50%
      left: auto
      margin-right: -$tooltip-triangle-size

    &:before
      margin-right: -$tooltip-triangle-size * 3
  @else
    @warn "direction not valid in tooltip mixin"


// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.tooltip--tl
  +tooltip(tl)

.tooltip--tr
  +tooltip(tr)

.tooltip--bl
  +tooltip(bl)

.tooltip--br
  +tooltip(br)


// Demo wrapper
// --------------------------------------------------
.tooltip-demo
  margin: 50px 0
  text-align: center

sections.markup: Live
sections.css:
// Block
// --------------------------------------------------
.live
  position: absolute
  top: -5px
  left: -5px
  width: 85px
  height: 85px
  overflow: hidden


// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.live__container
  position: relative

.live__inner
  background-color: $red
  text-align: center
  text-transform: uppercase
  padding: 3px 0
  width: 120px
  left: -27px
  top: 21px
  position: relative
  font-weight: $font-weight-bold
  color: #fff
  transform: rotate(-45deg)
  box-shadow: 1px 1px 1px $gray-light
  &:before,
  &:after
    content: ''
    border-top: 4px solid $gray-base
    border-left: 4px solid transparent
    border-right: 4px solid transparent
    position: absolute
    bottom: -4px
  &:before
    left: 0
  &:after
    right: 0

sections.css:
$modal-width-xs: 300px
$modal-width-sm: 440px
$modal-width: 540px
$modal-width-lg: 790px
// Block
// --------------------------------------------------
// .modal

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.modal__input
  // Visually hide checkbox button
  position: absolute
  opacity: 0

.modal__label
  cursor: pointer

.modal__inner
  display: none
  position: fixed
  top: 50%
  transform: translateY(-50%)
  left: 50%
  width: $modal-width
  margin: 0 (-$modal-width/2)
  box-shadow: 0 5px 10px 0 lighten($gray-base, 30%)
  z-index: 101

.modal__title
  background-color: $brand-primary
  padding: 10px 30px
  color: #fff
  text-align: center
  font-weight: $font-weight-bold

.modal__content
  background-color: #fff
  padding: 30px
  font-weight: $font-weight-bold

.modal__overlay
  display: none
  +overlay


// States
// --------------------------------------------------
.modal__input:focus ~ .modal__inner
  display: block
  animation:
    name: modal-inner
    duration: 250ms
    timing-function: ease-in-out
    iteration-count: 1
    fill-mode: forwards
.modal__input:focus ~ .modal__overlay
  display: block
  animation:
    name: modal-overlay
    duration: 250ms
    timing-function: ease-in-out
    iteration-count: 1
    fill-mode: forwards

// Prevent closing element when clicking inside.
.modal__inner:hover
  &,
  & + .modal__overlay
    display: block !important


@keyframes modal-overlay
  0%
    opacity: 0
  100%
    opacity: 1

@keyframes modal-inner
  0%
    opacity: 0
  100%
    opacity: 1

// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.modal--xs
  .modal__inner
    margin: 0 (-$modal-width-xs/2)
    width: $modal-width-xs

.modal--sm
  .modal__inner
    margin: 0 (-$modal-width-sm/2)
    width: $modal-width-sm

.modal--lg
  .modal__inner
    margin: 0 (-$modal-width-lg/2)
    width: $modal-width-lg
sections.renderMarkup:
Modal of class {$modifiers}
Modal content

.owl-nav
  position: absolute
  margin: -$owl-nav-size/2 0
  top: 50%
  width: 100%
  padding: 5px 20px

  text-align: center
  font-size: $owl-nav-size
  overflow: hidden
  color: #fff

.owl-prev,
.owl-next
  width: $owl-nav-size

.owl-prev
  float: left
.owl-next
  float: right

.owl-dots

  bottom: 20px

.owl-dot
  display: inline-block
  width: 6px
  height: 6px
  margin: 0 6px
  box-shadow: 0 0 3px $text-color
  +circle(transparent, #fff, 2px)

sections.description: Parallax effect written in pure CSS. Parallax is unique component. It should be used on layout abstraction level, as wrapper of whole content structure. Layer groups that contains backlayers must have lower z-index than default. It is achieved by using .parallax__group--with-baselayer modifier class. To display page properly, all layout elements, including header and footer, should be placed at least inside the .parallax div. You can even use it as a body class. Inspired by http://keithclark.co.uk/articles/pure-css-parallax-websites. Enable fullscreen preview to see a valid demonstration.

sections.css:
// Block
// --------------------------------------------------
.parallax
  height: 100vh
  overflow-x: hidden
  overflow-y: auto
  perspective: 300px
  perspective-origin-x: 100%

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.parallax__group
  position: relative
  height: 100vh
  transform-style: preserve-3d
  z-index: 2

.parallax__baselayer,
.parallax__backlayer
  position: absolute
  top: 0
  right: 0
  bottom: 0
  left: 0
  transform-origin-x: 100%

.parallax__baselayer
  transform: translateZ(0)
  opacity: 0.9
  height: 100vh
  // Defining height is not necessary

.parallax__backlayer
  transform: translateZ(-300px) scale(2.01)
  // Use translateY to correct backlayer's vertical position


// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.parallax--debug
  .parallax__group
    transform: translate3d(700px, 0, -800px) rotateY(30deg)
  .parallax__baselayer,
  .parallax__backlayer
    border: 5px solid $gray-base

.parallax__group--with-backlayer
  z-index: 1


// Demo code below - can be removed on production site
.parallax_demo-title
  position: absolute
  text-align: center
  left: 0
  right: 0
  top: 50%
  font-size: 60px
  font-weight: bold
.parallax__demo-solid
  background-color: $brand-primary

Popover title

sections.css:
$popover-width: 230px

// Block
// --------------------------------------------------
.popover
  position: relative
  display: inline-block

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.popover__input
  // Visually hide checkbox button
  position: absolute
  opacity: 0

.popover__label
  cursor: pointer

.popover__inner
  position: absolute !important
  bottom: 100%
  left: 50%
  width: $popover-width
  margin: 0 0 25px -35px
  padding: 20px
  box-sizing: border-box
  display: none
  background-color: #fff
  border-radius: 7px
  text-align: left
  text-transform: none
  line-height: $line-height-base
  color: $text-color
  z-index: 101
  box-shadow: $gray-lighter 2px 0 0
  +arrow($gray-lighter, #fff, "bottom", "out", 15px, 20px)

.popover__title
  font-size: 18px
  font-weight: $font-weight-bold
  margin-bottom: 12px

.popover__overlay
  display: none
  +overlay


// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.popover--left
  .popover__inner
    margin-left: -$popover-width+35px
    &::before
      left: auto
      right: 20px
    &::after
      left: auto
      right: 19px


// States
// --------------------------------------------------
.popover__input:focus ~ .popover__overlay
  display: block
  animation:
    name: popover-overlay
    duration: 500ms
    timing-function: ease-in-out
    iteration-count: 1
    fill-mode: forwards
.popover__input:focus ~ .popover__inner
  display: block
  transform-origin: bottom left
  animation:
    name: popover-inner
    duration: 500ms
    timing-function: ease-in-out
    iteration-count: 1
    fill-mode: forwards

// Prevent closing element when clicking inside.
.popover__inner:hover
  &,
  & + .popover__overlay
    display: block !important


@keyframes popover-overlay
  0%
    opacity: 0
  100%
    opacity: 1

@keyframes popover-inner
  0%
    opacity: 0
    bottom: 25%
    transform: scale(0.05) rotate(30deg) rotateX(-90deg)
  50%
    transform: rotate(-10deg) rotateX(-2deg)
  70%
    transform: rotate(3deg)
    bottom: 100%
  100%
    opacity: 1
    transform: scale(1)


// Demo wrapper
// --------------------------------------------------
.popover-demo
  margin: 150px 0 20px
  text-align: center
sections.renderMarkup:
Popover title
Popover content

sections.description: Tabs switched by pure CSS basing on radio inputs, inspired by http://youmightnotneedjs.com/#tabs. Works with up to 7 elements. If you want to use tabs just as a static elements, remove inputs and replace labels with standard divs.
sections.markup:
Content for the first tab

Content for the second tab

Content for the third tab
sections.css:
// Block
// --------------------------------------------------
.tabs
  position: relative
  &::after
    content: ""
    display: table
    clear: both

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.tabs__input
  // Visually hide radio buttons
  position: absolute
  opacity: 0
  display: none

.tabs__label
  display: block
  float: left
  cursor: pointer
  margin: 0
  background: $gray-base
  color: white
  padding: 5px 10px
  margin-right: 2px
  overflow: hidden

.tabs__content
  top: $line-height-base + 10
  left: 0
  overflow: hidden
  width: 100%
  padding: 10px
  background: $gray-light
  opacity: 0
  display: none

// States
// --------------------------------------------------
// Open content when clicking label (jQuery mimic)
$foo : ''
@for $i from 1 through 7
  $foo : $foo + '#tabs-toggle-' + $i + ':checked ~ #tabs-content-' + $i + ','
#{$foo}
  opacity: 1
  display: block

// Change styling of active label.
.tabs__input:checked + .tabs__label
  background-color: $gray-light

section.css:
$form-item-width: 300px
$form-item-height: 40px
$form-item-margin: 30px
$form-item-font-size: $font-size-base
$form-item-bg: $gray-lighter

// Block
// --------------------------------------------------
.form
  margin: 0


// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.form__item
  margin: 0 0 $form-item-margin
  position: relative
  width: $form-item-width
  overflow: visible
  box-sizing: border-box
  max-width: 100%
  // Make form item full collumn width if is is composed in grid layout:
  *[class^="col-"] > &,
  *[class^="col-"] > .box > &
    width: auto
// Table layout integration
td, th
  &.form__item
    margin: 0
    padding: 0
    vertical-align: middle


.form__label
  display: block
  margin: 0
  font-size: $font-size-small
  text-transform: none
  font-weight: $font-weight-bold


.form__actions
  margin-top: $form-item-margin * 3
  button,
  input[type="button"],
  input[type="submit"]
    margin: 0


.form__input
  width: 100%
  margin: 0
  border: 2px solid transparent
  border-radius: 0
  height: $form-item-height
  line-height: $form-item-height - ($form-item-height/3)
  padding: $form-item-height/6 10px
  box-sizing: border-box
  font-size: $form-item-font-size
  transition: all 200ms ease-in
  background-color: $form-item-bg
  +placeholder($gray-light)
  &[type=file]
    line-height: $form-item-height * 0.45
textarea.form__input
  height: auto
select.form__input
  -webkit-appearance: none
  padding-right: 30px
  cursor: pointer
  // Custom caret:
  &:not([multiple])
    background:
      image: linear-gradient(45deg, transparent 50%, $text-color 50%), linear-gradient(135deg, $text-color 50%, transparent 50%)
      position: calc(100% - 15px) $form-item-height/2-2px, calc(100% - 10px) $form-item-height/2-2px
      size: 5px 5px, 5px 5px
      repeat: no-repeat
  &[multiple]
    height: auto


.form__checkbox,
.form__radio
  display: block


.form__help
  position: absolute
  top: 100%
  display: block
  margin: 0
  font-size: $font-size-xsmall
  line-height: $font-size-xsmall * 1.5
  color: lighten($text-color, 10%)


.form__addon
  position: absolute
  top: $line-height-base
  right: $form-item-height / 3
  font-size: $form-item-font-size * 0.7
  line-height: $form-item-height


// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.form__item--inline
  width: 100%
  .form__checkbox,
  .form__radio
    display: inline-block
    margin-right: 20px

.form__item--fancy
  .form__checkbox
    input
      position: relative
      width: 36px
      height: 14px
      display: inline-block
      background-color: $gray-light
      margin: 0 5px 0 0
      padding: 0
      border-radius: 7px
      -webkit-appearance: none
      border: none
      outline: 0
      vertical-align: middle
      transform: translateY(-1px)
      cursor: pointer
      &::after
        content: ''
        display: block
        width: 20px
        height: 20px
        position: absolute
        left: 0
        top: -3px
        background-color: $gray-lighter
        border: 1px solid darken($gray-lighter, 5%)
        border-radius: 10px
        box-sizing: border-box
      &:checked
        background-color: $green
        &::after
          left: auto
          right: 0


// States
// --------------------------------------------------
.form__input:focus
  border: 2px solid $brand-primary
  box-shadow: none
  outline-width: 0


*[disabled]
  opacity: 0.5
  cursor: not-allowed
input[disabled],
textarea[disabled],
select[disabled],
*[disabled] input,
*[disabled] textarea,
*[disabled] select,
*[disabled] .form__checkbox,
*[disabled] .form__radio
  pointer-events: none

.form__item.is-success
  .form__label,
  .form__addon,
  .form__help,
  .form__checkbox,
  .form__radio
    color: darken($green, 5%)
  .form__input:not(:focus)
    border-color: lighten($green, 10%)


.form__item.has-error
  .form__label,
  .form__addon,
  .form__help,
  .form__checkbox,
  .form__radio
    color: darken($red, 15%)
  .form__input:not(:focus)
    border-color: lighten($red, 15%)
    background-color: lighten($red, 53%)

section.css:
// Block
// --------------------------------------------------
.timeline
  margin: 21px auto 16px
  display: table
  width: 100%
  max-width: 740px
  table-layout: fixed
  line-height: 21px

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.timeline__label
  margin: 20px 0 0 50%
  width: 100%
  text-align: center
  white-space: nowrap
  font-weight: $font-weight-bold

.timeline__item
  display: table-cell
  position: relative
  overflow: visible
  // Dots
  &::before
    content: ''
    position: absolute
    right: -7px
    display: block
    width: 15px
    height: 15px
    background-color: $brand-primary-light
    border: 4px solid $brand-primary-light
    border-radius: 50%
    box-sizing: border-box
    z-index: 2

  // First element
  &:first-of-type
    width: 0
    .timeline__label
      width: 40px
      margin-left: -20px

  // All other elements
  & + .timeline__item
    &::after
      content: ''
      position: absolute
      display: block
      height: 4px
      width: calc(100% - 10px)
      right: 5px
      top: 5px
      z-index: 1
      background-color: $brand-primary-light

// States
// --------------------------------------------------
.timeline__item.is-active
  .timeline__label
    font-weight: $font-weight-bold
  & ~ .timeline__item
    &::before
      border-color: $gray-lighter
      background-color: transparent
    &::after
      background-color: $gray-lighter

section.description: Accordion switched by pure CSS basing on radio inputs, inspired by http://youmightnotneedjs.com/#tabs. Works with up to 7 elements.
section.markup:
Content for the first accordion

Content for the second accordion

Content for the third accordion
section.css:
// Block
// --------------------------------------------------
// .accordion

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.accordion__input
  // Visually hide radio buttons
  position: absolute
  opacity: 0

.accordion__label
  position: relative
  display: block
  cursor: pointer
  margin: 0 0 1px
  background: $gray-light
  color: white
  padding: 3px 40px 3px 10px
  overflow: hidden
  &::after
    content: '+'
    position: absolute
    display: block
    top: 0
    right: 0
    height: 100%
    width: 30px
    padding: 3px 0
    text-align: center
  &:checked
    content: '-'

.accordion__content
  height: 0
  opacity: 0
  transition: 500ms opacity ease-in-out

// States
// --------------------------------------------------
// Open content when clicking label (jQuery mimic)
$foo : ''
@for $i from 1 through 7
  $foo : $foo + '#accordion-toggle-' + $i + ':checked ~ #accordion-content-' + $i + ','
#{$foo}
  height: auto
  opacity: 1
  padding: 20px 10px 0

// Change symbol on label.
.accordion__input:checked + .accordion__label
  &::after
    content: '-'

section.markup: Button
section.css:
// Block
// --------------------------------------------------
.btn
  background: transparent
  padding: 11px 25px
  font-family: $font-family-base
  font-weight: $font-weight-bold
  font-size: $font-size-base
  letter-spacing: 0.05em
  border: 2px solid
  border-radius: 30px
  white-space: nowrap
  cursor: pointer
  display: inline-block
  width: auto
  height: auto
  box-sizing: border-box
  +btn-color($text-color)
  &:hover, &:focus
    transition: color 250ms, border-color 250ms, background 250ms
    +btn-color(#fff, $text-color, $text-color)

.btn + .btn
  margin-left: 15px

button,
input[type="button"],
input[type="submit"]
  @extend .btn
  margin-top: 30px


// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.btn--block
  width: 100%
  display: block
  max-width: none
  text-align: center
  & + &
    margin: 25px 0 0

.btn--xs
  padding: 3px 10px 4px

.btn--sm
  padding: 7px 20px 9px

.btn--lg
  padding: 15px 35px
  border-radius: 30px

.btn--light
  +btn-color(#fff, #fff)
  &:hover, &:focus
    +btn-color($text-color, #fff, #fff)
    font-weight: $font-weight-bold

.btn--primary
  +btn-color(#fff, $brand-primary, $brand-primary)
  &:hover, &:focus
    +btn-color($brand-primary)
    font-weight: $font-weight-bold

.btn--link
  border: none
  padding-left: 0
  padding-right: 0
  +btn-color($brand-primary, $brand-primary)
  &:hover, &:focus
    +btn-color($brand-primary)
    text-decoration: underline

.btn--disabled
  opacity: 0.15
  cursor: not-allowed
section.renderMarkup: Button

section.description: A circular diagram based on pure CSS technique. animation-delay value serves as a percentage input. Delete ::after pseudoclass styling to get the full pie chart. Inspired by http://codepen.io/MikitaLisavets/pen/PqEwvV
section.markup: 42%
section.css:
$donut-chart-size: 100px
$donut-chart-bar-width: 33px

// Block
// --------------------------------------------------
.donut-chart
  width: $donut-chart-size
  height: $donut-chart-size
  margin: 0 auto
  background: $gray-lightest linear-gradient(to right, $gray-lightest 50%, $gray-light 50%)
  color: $gray-light
  border-radius: 50%
  position: relative
  &::before
    content: ''
    position: absolute
    display: block
    background-color: inherit
    height: 100%
    width: 50%
    bottom: 0
    right: 0
    border-radius: 0 100% 100% 0 / 50%
    transform: rotate(0)
    transform-origin: 0 50%
    animation: 50s donut-chart-spin infinite linear, 100s donut-chart-background infinite step-end
    animation-play-state: paused
    animation-delay: inherit
  // Inner circle mask. Delete it to get pie chart.
  &::after
    content: ''
    position: absolute
    width: $donut-chart-size - $donut-chart-bar-width
    height: $donut-chart-size - $donut-chart-bar-width
    top: 0
    right: 0
    bottom: 0
    left: 0
    margin: auto
    background: #fff
    border-radius: 50%


@keyframes donut-chart-spin
  to
    transform: rotate(180deg)
@keyframes donut-chart-background
  50%
    background-color: currentColor


// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.donut-chart__label
  position: absolute
  top: 50%
  left: 0
  right: 0
  width: 50px
  margin: 0 auto
  transform: translateY(-50%)
  font-weight: $font-weight-bold
  text-align: center
  z-index: 1
  color: $gray-base

section.markup: Hover me
section.css:
$tooltip-bg-color: #2c3e50
$tooltip-width: 200px
$tooltip-triangle-size: 6px

// Block
// --------------------------------------------------
.tooltip
  display: inline-block
  position: relative

  &:before, &:after
    opacity: 0
    z-index: 98
    +breakpoint(phone, phone)
      display: none

  &:before
    // tooltip body
    content: attr(data-tooltip)
    position: absolute
    width: $tooltip-width
    padding: 10px 15px
    line-height: 18px
    text-align: left
    font-size: 13px
    font-weight: normal
    white-space: normal
    box-shadow: 1px 1px 3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3)
    border-radius: 3px
    background-color: $tooltip-bg-color

    @if lightness($tooltip-bg-color) < 50%
      // dynamically determine light or dark color based on $tooltip-bg-color
      color: #fff
    @else
      color: $gray-base

  &:after
    content: ''

  &:hover
    &:before, &:after
      opacity: 1



// Tooltip styling mixin
=tooltip($direction: tl)
  // apply positioning to top and bottom values
  @if $direction == "tl" or $direction == "tr"
    &:before
      top: -($tooltip-triangle-size + 3px)
      bottom: auto

      // override with auto in case this tooltip is overriding a previous instance in another direction
      transform: translateY(-100%)

    &:after
      +triangle(down, $tooltip-triangle-size, $tooltip-bg-color)

      top: -($tooltip-triangle-size + 3px)
      bottom: auto
  @else if $direction == "br" or $direction == "bl"
    &:before
      bottom: -($tooltip-triangle-size + 3px)
      top: auto

      // extra 3px for spacing
      transform: translateY(100%)

    &:after
      +triangle(up, $tooltip-triangle-size, $tooltip-bg-color)

      bottom: -($tooltip-triangle-size + 3px)
      top: auto

  // apply positioning to left and right values
  @if $direction == "tr" or $direction == "br"
    &:before, &:after
      left: 50%
      right: auto
      margin-left: -$tooltip-triangle-size

    &:before
      margin-left: -$tooltip-triangle-size * 3
  @else if $direction == "tl" or $direction == "bl"
    &:before, &:after
      right: 50%
      left: auto
      margin-right: -$tooltip-triangle-size

    &:before
      margin-right: -$tooltip-triangle-size * 3
  @else
    @warn "direction not valid in tooltip mixin"


// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.tooltip--tl
  +tooltip(tl)

.tooltip--tr
  +tooltip(tr)

.tooltip--bl
  +tooltip(bl)

.tooltip--br
  +tooltip(br)


// Demo wrapper
// --------------------------------------------------
.tooltip-demo
  margin: 50px 0
  text-align: center
section.renderMarkup: Hover me

section.markup:
Modal of class {$modifiers}
Modal content
section.css:
$modal-width-xs: 300px
$modal-width-sm: 440px
$modal-width: 540px
$modal-width-lg: 790px
// Block
// --------------------------------------------------
// .modal

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.modal__input
  // Visually hide checkbox button
  position: absolute
  opacity: 0

.modal__label
  cursor: pointer

.modal__inner
  display: none
  position: fixed
  top: 50%
  transform: translateY(-50%)
  left: 50%
  width: $modal-width
  margin: 0 (-$modal-width/2)
  box-shadow: 0 5px 10px 0 lighten($gray-base, 30%)
  z-index: 101

.modal__title
  background-color: $brand-primary
  padding: 10px 30px
  color: #fff
  text-align: center
  font-weight: $font-weight-bold

.modal__content
  background-color: #fff
  padding: 30px
  font-weight: $font-weight-bold

.modal__overlay
  display: none
  +overlay


// States
// --------------------------------------------------
.modal__input:focus ~ .modal__inner
  display: block
  animation:
    name: modal-inner
    duration: 250ms
    timing-function: ease-in-out
    iteration-count: 1
    fill-mode: forwards
.modal__input:focus ~ .modal__overlay
  display: block
  animation:
    name: modal-overlay
    duration: 250ms
    timing-function: ease-in-out
    iteration-count: 1
    fill-mode: forwards

// Prevent closing element when clicking inside.
.modal__inner:hover
  &,
  & + .modal__overlay
    display: block !important


@keyframes modal-overlay
  0%
    opacity: 0
  100%
    opacity: 1

@keyframes modal-inner
  0%
    opacity: 0
  100%
    opacity: 1

// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.modal--xs
  .modal__inner
    margin: 0 (-$modal-width-xs/2)
    width: $modal-width-xs

.modal--sm
  .modal__inner
    margin: 0 (-$modal-width-sm/2)
    width: $modal-width-sm

.modal--lg
  .modal__inner
    margin: 0 (-$modal-width-lg/2)
    width: $modal-width-lg
section.renderMarkup:
Modal of class {$modifiers}
Modal content

section.description: Parallax effect written in pure CSS. Parallax is unique component. It should be used on layout abstraction level, as wrapper of whole content structure. Layer groups that contains backlayers must have lower z-index than default. It is achieved by using .parallax__group--with-baselayer modifier class. To display page properly, all layout elements, including header and footer, should be placed at least inside the .parallax div. You can even use it as a body class. Inspired by http://keithclark.co.uk/articles/pure-css-parallax-websites. Enable fullscreen preview to see a valid demonstration.

modifiers.name: default
modifiers.markup:
Solid base layer
Transparent base layer
Back layer

modifiers.renderMarkup:

Transparent base layer

Transparent base layer

section.markup:
Solid base layer
Transparent base layer
Back layer
Solid base layer
Solid base layer
section.css:
// Block
// --------------------------------------------------
.parallax
  height: 100vh
  overflow-x: hidden
  overflow-y: auto
  perspective: 300px
  perspective-origin-x: 100%

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.parallax__group
  position: relative
  height: 100vh
  transform-style: preserve-3d
  z-index: 2

.parallax__baselayer,
.parallax__backlayer
  position: absolute
  top: 0
  right: 0
  bottom: 0
  left: 0
  transform-origin-x: 100%

.parallax__baselayer
  transform: translateZ(0)
  opacity: 0.9
  height: 100vh
  // Defining height is not necessary

.parallax__backlayer
  transform: translateZ(-300px) scale(2.01)
  // Use translateY to correct backlayer's vertical position


// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.parallax--debug
  .parallax__group
    transform: translate3d(700px, 0, -800px) rotateY(30deg)
  .parallax__baselayer,
  .parallax__backlayer
    border: 5px solid $gray-base

.parallax__group--with-backlayer
  z-index: 1


// Demo code below - can be removed on production site
.parallax_demo-title
  position: absolute
  text-align: center
  left: 0
  right: 0
  top: 50%
  font-size: 60px
  font-weight: bold
.parallax__demo-solid
  background-color: $brand-primary
section.renderMarkup:
Solid base layer
Transparent base layer
Back layer
Solid base layer
Solid base layer

Popover title

section.css:
$popover-width: 230px

// Block
// --------------------------------------------------
.popover
  position: relative
  display: inline-block

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.popover__input
  // Visually hide checkbox button
  position: absolute
  opacity: 0

.popover__label
  cursor: pointer

.popover__inner
  position: absolute !important
  bottom: 100%
  left: 50%
  width: $popover-width
  margin: 0 0 25px -35px
  padding: 20px
  box-sizing: border-box
  display: none
  background-color: #fff
  border-radius: 7px
  text-align: left
  text-transform: none
  line-height: $line-height-base
  color: $text-color
  z-index: 101
  box-shadow: $gray-lighter 2px 0 0
  +arrow($gray-lighter, #fff, "bottom", "out", 15px, 20px)

.popover__title
  font-size: 18px
  font-weight: $font-weight-bold
  margin-bottom: 12px

.popover__overlay
  display: none
  +overlay


// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.popover--left
  .popover__inner
    margin-left: -$popover-width+35px
    &::before
      left: auto
      right: 20px
    &::after
      left: auto
      right: 19px


// States
// --------------------------------------------------
.popover__input:focus ~ .popover__overlay
  display: block
  animation:
    name: popover-overlay
    duration: 500ms
    timing-function: ease-in-out
    iteration-count: 1
    fill-mode: forwards
.popover__input:focus ~ .popover__inner
  display: block
  transform-origin: bottom left
  animation:
    name: popover-inner
    duration: 500ms
    timing-function: ease-in-out
    iteration-count: 1
    fill-mode: forwards

// Prevent closing element when clicking inside.
.popover__inner:hover
  &,
  & + .popover__overlay
    display: block !important


@keyframes popover-overlay
  0%
    opacity: 0
  100%
    opacity: 1

@keyframes popover-inner
  0%
    opacity: 0
    bottom: 25%
    transform: scale(0.05) rotate(30deg) rotateX(-90deg)
  50%
    transform: rotate(-10deg) rotateX(-2deg)
  70%
    transform: rotate(3deg)
    bottom: 100%
  100%
    opacity: 1
    transform: scale(1)


// Demo wrapper
// --------------------------------------------------
.popover-demo
  margin: 150px 0 20px
  text-align: center
section.renderMarkup:
Popover title
Popover content

section.description: Tabs switched by pure CSS basing on radio inputs, inspired by http://youmightnotneedjs.com/#tabs. Works with up to 7 elements. If you want to use tabs just as a static elements, remove inputs and replace labels with standard divs.
section.markup:
Content for the first tab

Content for the second tab

Content for the third tab
section.css:
// Block
// --------------------------------------------------
.tabs
  position: relative
  &::after
    content: ""
    display: table
    clear: both

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.tabs__input
  // Visually hide radio buttons
  position: absolute
  opacity: 0
  display: none

.tabs__label
  display: block
  float: left
  cursor: pointer
  margin: 0
  background: $gray-base
  color: white
  padding: 5px 10px
  margin-right: 2px
  overflow: hidden

.tabs__content
  top: $line-height-base + 10
  left: 0
  overflow: hidden
  width: 100%
  padding: 10px
  background: $gray-light
  opacity: 0
  display: none

// States
// --------------------------------------------------
// Open content when clicking label (jQuery mimic)
$foo : ''
@for $i from 1 through 7
  $foo : $foo + '#tabs-toggle-' + $i + ':checked ~ #tabs-content-' + $i + ','
#{$foo}
  opacity: 1
  display: block

// Change styling of active label.
.tabs__input:checked + .tabs__label
  background-color: $gray-light
section.renderMarkup:
Content for the first tab

Content for the second tab
